channel.title: Vivek Oberoi on Week In Memes - What's Going Viral in India?
channel.description: Recent content in Vivek Oberoi on Week In Memes - What's Going Viral in India?

item.title: Week 010 - RIP Grumpy Cat, Vivek Oberoi, Radars and Met Gala
item.description: First up, we say good bye to a beloved meme, Grumpy Cat. She was 7 years old. RIP :(

item.title: Vivek Oberoi as Modi memes
item.description:
Origin

The trailer for Vivek Oberoi’s movie PM Narendra Modi released on Mar 20, 2019. Bollywood and politics coming together is the perfect recipe for memes.

item.title: Week 005 - Mankading, Chowkidar, Vivek Oberoi as Modi
item.description: If this post goes up later than usual I blame India for destroying the satellite handling my internet connection. Modi is back in the news with an address to the nation after taking a brief step back thanks to IPL. Let’s recap this week.
